description: Monitor for changes made to files for unexpected modifications to access permissions and attributes. Analytic 1 - Modified Files in Linux Cron Directories source="*Linux:*" (Path LIKE "/etc/cron.allow.d" OR Path LIKE "/etc/cron.d/" OR Path LIKE "/etc/cron.hourly" OR Path LIKE "/etc/cron.daily" OR Path LIKE "/etc/cron.weeky" OR Path LIKE "/etc/cron.monthly")
